name: Cappuccino
desc: Experience our classic cappuccino, featuring rich espresso, steamed milk, and a thick, velvety foam layer.

name: Cold Brew
desc: Refresh with our smooth cold brew, steeped for hours to deliver bold, rich coffee flavor.

name: Mocha
desc: Treat yourself to our rich mocha, combining espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk for a delightful flavor.

name: Coffee Latte
desc: A smooth, creamy coffee latte made with rich espresso and steamed milk, perfect for any time.

name: Pizza
desc: Enjoy our delicious pizza topped with fresh ingredients, melty cheese, and a perfectly crispy crust.

name: Croissant
desc: Indulge in our flaky, buttery croissants, baked fresh daily for a perfect, delicate treat.

name: Spaghetti
desc: Savor our spaghetti, perfectly cooked and topped with rich, savory sauce and fresh ingredients.

name: Burger
desc: Enjoy our juicy burger with crispy fries, made with fresh ingredients and packed with flavor.
